<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get a migration"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/migrations/{migration_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to fetch a specific migration in your Port organization.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"migration_id","description":"The identifier of the migration you want to fetch.<br/>","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Default Response"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
